nodes.text: Semblan was the official language of the Vurk species and of their homeworld Sembla. Many years before the Galactic Empire's rise, Semblan was decided as the universal language out of hundreds of dialects after planet-wide discussion, and the planet's name was changed from Utavurk to Sembla. Many disagreed with this change, and still spoke their local languages on Sembla. Vurk travelling off-world learned Galactic Basic Standard.
